Articles.Content:
Hi!

I'm currently searching pictures for my screen saver(so far, I have 756 images and my goal is 1000, call me crazy if you want).

However, I can't find a site that has good images(in HD( and, this is quite important, that has A LOT of images!

I particularly like pictures about space, science and animals.

Oh, and I already went trough the "space and science" and "animals" category of the Nationals Geographic wallpapers.

Thank you!
Maybe start opening up more, and have some tolerance for mud.

Yes but I have 254 image to find...

I can't imagine what to search in google image in order to find them: I did that for the first 100 and it was quite long; I can't even imagine how long it would be if I did that for more than 250 images.

Personally, i love pictures of iss, shuttle, spacex rockets... I advice you to search for them in google.

Here's my favorite pic:

Thank you for the advice

Oh, anyone know a website that could tell me if I have double image?

It's kind of hard to compare each image if I think I already have a given image :\

Ok guys, I accomplished my goal!

I have 1000 images for my screen saver!

I know I could have done something more useful, but....
